column4: i was wanting to experiment with some other linux distros and was wondering how to quintuple (?) boot. i have ubuntu and vista currently and would like to add gentoo, fedora and opensuse (all x64). will grub work for all of these and how do i configure grub inside ubuntu to see all of the os's
